sentences.english: Q. I am an MT4 user, how will my account be affected?
sentences.chinese: 我是一名MT4用户，我的账户会受到甚么样的影响？

sentences.english: But China’s surplus is dropping faster.
sentences.chinese: 但是中国的往来账户盈余漏失很快。

sentences.english: Registratie ongedaan maken van de User Account Control Support Library is mislukt.
sentences.chinese: 取消用户账户支持运行库失败。

sentences.english: B：We want to open a US dollar account with your bank.
sentences.chinese: 我们想在贵行开一个美元账户。

sentences.english: Modifications have been made to thee-gold Account User Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 已作了更改，以电子黄金账户的用户协议。
妈妈从账户上取出100美元。

sentences.english: These costs are charged to an asset account entitled organization costs.
sentences.chinese: 这些成本计入一个名为开办费的资产账户。

sentences.english: Examples of projects I have helped fund through my Kiva account.
sentences.chinese: 我曾通过我的Kiva账户为这两个项目提供资金。

sentences.english: Retirement accounts and savings, they say, have been drained to pay legal fees.
sentences.chinese: 用来支付诉讼费用的退休金账户和储蓄已被耗尽。

sentences.english: Could you provide us with the requisite financial information so that we can open your new account immediately?
sentences.chinese: 烦请提供有关的财务资料，以能立即开立账户。

sentences.english: This code can be followed by a reference to a specific account.
sentences.chinese: 这个代码后面可以跟一个对一个特定账户的引用。

sentences.english: The private key is used to access the Bitcoins kept in the payor's account.
sentences.chinese: 私钥用于访问比特币付款人的账户。

sentences.english: Please return the session money to the student.
sentences.chinese: 请将课时金额退至学生账户。

sentences.english: It's the first time I had ever  overdrawn  my account.
sentences.chinese: 那是我第一次透支我的账户。

sentences.english: We cannot accept copies of online credit card statements.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受在线信用卡账户电子结单的复印件。

sentences.english: Your personal information will be disclosed for the purposes of maintaining your account with Kitco.
sentences.chinese: 您的个人信息仅在维护您的金拓账户时使用。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to deposit (e.g. in a bank account)
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
